it's awful, love. even when its the good love and you've loved back, it still hurts. when ever i'm not with him, when ever he's with anyone else, whenever he's sad or paranoid or angry, it hurts worse than bad love. but when we are together and happy, it feels so right, we fit perfectly with each other. we can just smile and talk and touch for hours and sometimes it feels like seconds, that will last forever. and sometimes it even feels so good that it hurts when you're together because it's more perfect than anything and you feel like crying and don't know why. it feels like no one else is as in love, or will be ever, and no one else should matter.



-OHmyStArS-

so yea its 11:35pm and i have to wake up at 6:00 tomorrow morning... im gonna regret this.. but ah well.. Its time to vent.. Ive got some things on my mind.

ok ok so somethings have been bothering me for a few days now.. my boyfriend started talking about one of his close friends that happens to be female and all this time he spent with her and etc. i get jelous of course. but thats nothing new. and then he says that she wants to meet me.. get to know me.. you know.. so i know he wouldnt cheat on me with her.. that came off a little akward.. maybe he didnt mean that the way it was said.. but then he says.. i think you two would like each other-- *your like the same person*...... that brings me down on so many levels.. (i mean no offence to the girl-- i dont know her and im sure shes pretty neat -- what im feeling has nothing to do with her personally) 1. im exactly like someone else.. 2. hes in love with me and im exactly like her, yet hes not in love with her.. ? 3. well.. lets stop there.. dont want to get too deep.. but my point is.. yeah theres no point.. it was just upseting me. i mean i know hes not cheating on me.. i just needed to get that out... 

Anthony has been talking shit about me.. he thinks im a slut apparently.. do I come off as slutty? please let me know.

I hate being alone.. I was in Florida alone constantly.. i hated it.. i was left with my thoughts for too long and when that happens i get scared and paranoid.. god i was so paranoid about everything. i had 2 or 3 panic attacks within 6 days.. eep.

Rex pisses me off .. he forces himself apon me he hits me he throws stuff at me he calls me terrible things hits on me and i still forgive him for ruining me... 
Im stupid... hes stupid... thank god i never see him.. Id kill myself..

whew.. well Im off.. bed time!<3

so i met a guy named steve today at hot topic.. hes supposedly burning me some cds.. eh.. hes supposed to call at least. 


nini!

/CAROlCHAOS/

So today went not so well.

Cant do much about that though, can I? ... I got zero threatning calls though.. that is one good thing.. and i went Christmas shopping with Aprl. one other good thing... thats pretty much where the line stops.. haha.
I spent too much time arguing with my father, Ive had my fair share of him this weekend... I need no more for awhile. Though Im suffering a withdraw from Angel-pie, Ah I miss her... but Im fine without her.. =P. 
I need some lovin... damn.. Ive been alone at home for about 3 hours now.. Manda was gonna come over.. but eh well.. I guess she had other plans.. Grr.. I wish I had other plans too.. but I will live.
Lets work backwards... 
Saturday I went shopping with my mom and went out to lunch etc etc.. and then that night I got to hang out with Andrew Tracey and Jackie. yayy.. fun, yay for smoking bottom-of-the-bag weed! heh but oh well I cant complain.. i got high.. =P... aww andrew had the cutest puppys at his house.. i wanted one hehe... owwh well.. I can definatly think of some things I want more than that<3... 
Friday was amazing.. I dont think ive been so enthralled in quite awhile.. I was with brian.. It was a moment.. I dont know why, It just was.. you should have been there... no you shouldnt have what am I saying.. ah either way.. there was just beauty to it all.. beauty. *sigh*

ahh.. and Im venting!... (to those of you who dont know me very well, this is a side of me that doesnt show very often. =)..)

hmm.. 
Im really tired of being fucked over.. you know those kinds of people that say they are your friend or whatever they may be to you.. and then they just do something that completely fucks up your life or feelings or whatever.. ugh im sick of it.. what reminded me of this is when Jodee and I were chit chatting online and i said, messing with her, something along the lines of "I feel unwanted now.. RIP MY HEART OPEN, God Jodee now I have to take it to the doctors." (heh) and she replyed with: "I'll sew it up for you"... Thats what i could really use right now.. someone to sew my heart up for me.. that may sound really corny and i know it does but i guess its kinda true. No in all actuallity i think that what i really need is just someone to tell me they love me... or would that hurt more? .. eh I dont care.. I just want some one to say it... even if they dont mean it.. even a simple "your a good friend" would help. I just feel kinda worthless these days.. its been awhile folks... 
Ahh and another thing.. My self esteem has been super low lately.. Im sure you all have noticed. I think its starting to get to people.. but i cant help it! ... im pretty sure that most of the reason why ive felt this way is/was Derek's doing... eeerk.. I will always hold a grudge agianst him for what he did to me... even though I shouldnt.. (or maybe  should?).. its not even the fact that he cheated on me.. its the fact that he straight up LIED to me.. If he would have been honest with me it would be a whole different story. I suppose I could forgive him someday.. but not anytime too soon i dont believe. =/. 
Ahh.. I guess I have really no room to complain, this week has been better than Ive had in awhile... so i guess things might be looking up for me. =). I wish I wernt such a jelous person though.. thats definatly a flaw of mine. Kinda makes me sick in away though.. I mean.. I have alot to be thankful for.. I shouldnt be feeling sorry for myself. I know im not terrible looking.. and I know my personallity isnt bad either.. but I just dont want to realize it sometimes, Id rather just disagree.. its easier for me to think that way... another reason why I dont think so highly of myself besides all of the reasons ive listed.. is that.. so many people say things to me.. and it means nothing.. very RAREly does anyone say something nice to/about me to my face and i actually feel like they are telling the truth... It does happen.. but not often.. It did happen like last night which suprised me a little bit... I wont go into that though its not nescessary for you people to know everything.. lol.. =).. 
..ick.. i need to lose some weight.. Im not fat.. i know that.. I just feel..blah.. i dunno i cant explain it.. lol...
hmm well thats basically what im feeling at this point.. 

Later.
